name: MovieHaiku
0:
”Alexa, start Movie Haiku.”
”Alexa, open Movie Haiku.”
”Tell me a Movie Haiku.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie haiku
des: Movie Haiku is a short summary of all the small poems or haikus that are picked from various movies. Haikus, that you might never paid attention to. Now, they are under the spotlight. Let the show begin.
